item.title: 欧元集团多诺霍表示有信心周一达成 CMU 协议
item.description: 欧元集团主席帕夏尔-多诺霍（Paschal Donohoe）表示，他确信欧洲财政首脑将在周一的会议上就一个广泛的路线图达成协议，以推动该集团迈向资本市场联盟。【原文：Eurogroup President Paschal Donohoe said he’s sure European finance chief will reach an agreement on a broad roadmap to take the bloc toward a capital markets union at their Monday meeting.】

item.title: 伦敦证券交易所将接受比特币和以太坊 ETN 的申请
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所表示，将开始接受以比特币和以太币为支撑的交易所交易票据的入市申请，为专业投资者投资该资产类别开辟了另一条途径。【原文：The London Stock Exchange said it will start accepting applications for the admission of exchange traded notes backed by Bitcoin and Ether, opening another avenue for professional investors to invest in the asset class.】

item.title: 英国会计监管机构正在洽谈迁出伦敦金融城事宜
item.description: 英国会计监管机构财务报告委员会正在商谈年底前将其总部迁出伦敦金融城的事宜。【原文：The Financial Reporting Council, UK’s accounting watchdog, is in talks to move its headquarters out of the City of London by the end of the year.】

item.title: 后起之秀挑战现代投资的基础
item.description:
一位诺贝尔奖获得者的理论支持押注更便宜的股票，并为基金经理们树立了一个基准。但数字在不断变化。这有多重要？【原文：

A Nobel laureate’s theory supports betting on cheaper stocks and sets a benchmark for money managers. But the numbers keep changing. How much does it matter?

】

item.title: 香港为《保安条例草案》中的外来干涉指控辩护
item.description: 香港最高安全官员试图向立法者保证，香港金融中心的商业活动不会受到政府正在快速推进的安全立法中新增的外部干扰罪的影响。【原文：Hong Kong’s top security official sought to reassure lawmakers that business activities in the finance hub won’t be affected by new external interference offenses included in security legislation being fast-tracked by the government.】

item.title: 中国成长股在 CATL 和能源股的提振下大涨
item.description: 受电池和可再生能源行业相关股票反弹的提振，追踪中国成长股的指数跳涨。【原文：A gauge tracking Chinese growth stocks jumped, boosted by a rally in shares related to the battery and renewable energy sectors.】

item.title: 中国重大立法会议的五个重要启示
item.description: 在习近平主席日益集权的同时，中国希望避免经济增长放缓，并向技术创新驱动的经济转型。这是本月召开的全国人民代表大会给我们的启示，这是一年一度的立法会议，中国的橡皮图章议会在会上批准执政的共产党的政策。以下是此次会议对未来一年中国经济和政治走向的简要介绍。【原文：China wants to avoid a slowdown in growth and transition its economy to one driven by technological innovation, all as President Xi Jinping increasingly centralizes power. That’s the takeaway from this month’s National People’s Congress, the annual legislative gathering where China’s rubber-stamp parliament approves policies from the ruling Communist Party. Here’s a rundown of what the event revealed about the nation’s economic and political direction in year ahead.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡齐米尔倾向于 6 月减息，因为通胀回落依然脆弱
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员彼得-卡齐米尔（Peter Kazimir）认为，欧洲中央银行不应该在 6 月份之前降低利率，因为官员们需要更多的数据来确定通货膨胀已经得到控制。【原文：The European Central Bank shouldn’t lower interest rates before June as officials need more data to be sure that inflation has been tamed, according to Governing Council member Peter Kazimir.】

item.title: 黑胶唱片阔别 32 年后重返英国通胀篮子
item.description: 在黑胶唱片大受欢迎之后，32 年来黑胶唱片将首次回到英国的通胀购物篮中，而随着大流行病逐渐淡出英国人的购物习惯，洗手液也被淘汰出局。【原文：Vinyl records will return to the UK inflation basket for the first time in 32 years after a surge in their popularity, while hand sanitizer is out as the pandemic fades from the nation’s shopping habits.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织总裁格奥尔基耶娃赢得德国支持连任
item.description: 德国财政部长克里斯蒂安-林德纳表示，克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃 "正是领导 "国际货币基金组织的 "合适人选"，并公开承认德国支持其连任。【原文：Kristalina Georgieva is “exactly the right person to steer” the International Monetary Fund, German Finance Minister Christian Lindner said, openly acknowledging his country’s backing for a second term.】

item.title: 壳牌天然气和液化天然气资深专家史蒂夫-希尔将离开公司
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）周一表示，行业资深人士史蒂夫-希尔（Steve Hill）已决定辞职。【原文：Shell Plc industry veteran Steve Hill has decided to step down, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯指定经纪人与外国人交换冷冻资产
item.description: 俄罗斯任命了一名经纪人，负责在乌克兰入侵后受到国际制裁的俄罗斯和外国投资者之间进行资产交换。【原文：Russia appointed a broker to conduct swaps of assets between Russian and foreign investors caught up in international sanctions imposed after the invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 中国股市在年度政治活动中保持势头
item.description: 中国股市在立法者年度政策会议期间录得涨幅，这是六年来首次出现这种上扬。【原文：China’s equity market registered a gain for the duration of its legislators’ annual policy meeting, the first such upturn in six years.】

item.title: 学术界质疑 ESG 研究助推投资热潮
item.description:
越来越多的学者表示，表明公司可以通过做好事来获得成功的研究依赖于不可靠的证据。【原文：

A growing number of scholars say research showing companies can do well by doing good relies on shaky evidence.

】

item.title: 野村重组美国投资部门，计划发展私人信贷业务
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. has reorganized its US investment management efforts under new leadership as it looks to expand its private credit business.】

item.title: 摩根大通策略师称 "华丽七股 "并不昂贵
item.description: 越来越多的华尔街策略师淡化了对美国科技大盘股泡沫的担忧。【原文：The ranks of Wall Street strategists playing down concerns around a bubble in US technology megacap stocks are growing.】

item.title: 日本央行避免购买 ETF，引发政策变化猜测
item.description: 日本央行周一没有买入交易所交易基金，这出人意料地背离了其惯常的做法，即在早盘市场下跌 2% 或更多时买入。【原文：The Bank of Japan refrained from buying exchange-traded funds on Monday, a surprise departure from its usual playbook of buying when the market falls 2% or more in the morning session.】

item.title: 游说团体称南非必须应对停水等威胁
item.description: 南非一个重要的商业银行集团的负责人说，南非需要应对经济面临的 "新的和正在出现的 "威胁，比如国家供水系统的部分故障，从该国东部的姆博贝拉到约翰内斯堡南部，水龙头都在干涸。【原文：South Africa needs to manage “new and emerging” threats to the economy such as breakdowns in parts of its national water system, with taps running dry from Mbombela in the east of the country to the south of Johannesburg, the head of a key business-lobby group said.】

item.title: 佩蒂斯：中国转向消费者需要更多财政支持
item.description: 长期从事中国经济研究的迈克尔-佩蒂斯（Michael Pettis）认为，中国官员需要考虑直接支持家庭，以刺激经济增长。【原文：Chinese officials need to consider direct support to households in order to spur economic growth, according to longtime China economist Michael Pettis, floating a proposition Beijing has been reluctant to embrace.】

item.title: 印度最高法院斥责 SBI 冻结政治资金数据
item.description: 印度最高法院命令政府控制的印度国家银行在本周二之前披露通过有争议且现已被禁止的选举债券提供政治资金的相关数据。【原文：India’s Supreme Court ordered the government-controlled State Bank of India to disclose data related to political funding made through the controversial and now-banned electoral bonds by Tuesday.】

item.title: 南非银行不良贷款增加，Absa 盈利下降
item.description: 在消费者信心复苏乏力和借贷成本居高不下的情况下，这家南非贷款公司的国内不良贷款激增，导致 Absa 集团有限公司的利润自 2020 年以来首次出现下滑。【原文：Absa Group Ltd.’s profit fell for the first time since 2020 after the South African lender’s bad loans jumped at home amid a tepid recovery in consumer confidence and high borrowing costs.】

item.title: 捷克通胀率降至目标值，促进更快速的减税措施
雷蒙多称美国公司将在菲律宾投资 10 亿美元
item.description: 据率领代表团的美国商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）称，参加乔-拜登总统组织的贸易与投资代表团的美国公司将在菲律宾投资超过 10 亿美元。【原文：US companies that joined the trade and investment mission organized by President Joe Biden will invest more than $1 billion in the Philippines, according to US Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo who leads the delegation.】

item.title: 印度可能审查针对过热小盘股的基金规则
item.description: 印度市场监管机构周一表示，由于对小盘股估值过高的担忧日益加剧，该机构对修订共同基金投资小盘股的规则持开放态度。【原文：India’s markets regulator Monday said it is open to revising rules for mutual funds investing in small-cap stocks amid rising concerns about stretched valuations for this segment.】

item.title: 新西兰拉塔姆航空公司飞机事故造成至少 50 人受伤
item.description: 拉塔姆航空集团（Latam Airlines Group SA）一架从悉尼飞往奥克兰的航班在空中发生事故，造成至少 50 人受伤。【原文：At least 50 people have been injured after a Latam Airlines Group SA flight from Sydney to Auckland suffered a mid-air incident.】

item.title: Moderna 首席财务官谈如何在大型制药企业中分配资本
item.description:
在极端不确定的情况下进行投资。【原文：

Making investments under extreme uncertainty.

】

item.title: 埃利奥特退出收购要约后，库里股价暴跌
item.description: 艾略特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）退出了对 Currys Plc 的潜在收购，导致这家英国电子产品零售商的股价暴跌，并为中国的 JD.com Inc.【原文：Elliott Investment Management is walking away from a potential takeover of Currys Plc, causing the British electronics retailer’s shares to plunge and easing the way for a possible bid from China’s JD.com Inc.】

item.title: 挪威核心通货膨胀率降至18个月来最低水平
item.description: 挪威的基本通胀率降至一年半以来的最低水平，重新激发了人们对挪威央行可能会比原计划提前开始降息的预期。【原文：Norway’s underlying inflation rate declined to its lowest level in 1 1/2 years, reviving expectations that the country’s central bank could begin cutting interest rates earlier than planned.】

item.title: 中墨商务关系蓬勃发展，中国将恢复飞往墨西哥的航班
item.description: 中国最大的航空公司准备开通首条直飞墨西哥的航线，这标志着墨西哥作为世界第二大经济体通往美洲的门户的重要性日益凸显。【原文：China’s biggest airline is poised to establish its first nonstop service to Mexico, signaling the country’s growing importance as a gateway to the Americas for the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑在今年最佳一周后保持涨势
